org.cloudbus.cloudsim.container.containerProvisioners

Class ContainerRamProvisioner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.container.containerProvisioners.ContainerRamProvisioner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContainerRamProvisionerSimple

    public abstract class ContainerRamProvisioner
extends Object
    This class takes care of the provisioning of Container's ram .

    sareh
